string-array.name: crm_add_appointment
string-array.item: Click the [+] button at the bottom of the main page calendar
Click the [Create Application] button in the menu
Click on the [Visit] item of the new appliction
Follow the steps to complete the required fields. Click [Finish] to complete the form to generate work item
After Visit schedule created, the calendar displayed it synchronously, then click task to view the detailed content
Click the Visit task, scrolls it to view more information

string-array.name: crm_approval_quote
string-array.item: Click the [+] button at the bottom of the main page calendar
Click the [Create Application] button in the menu
Click on the [Quotation] item of the new appliction
Follow the steps to complete the required fields. Click [Finish] to complete the form to generate work item
After Quotation created, the calendar displayed it synchronously, then click task to view the detailed content
Click the Quotation task, scrolls it to view more information

string-array.name: crm_submit_quote
string-array.item: Click the [+] button at the bottom of the main page calendar
Click the [Work Report] button in the menu
Click the monthly report pane ,then enter the work report list

1. At the header of the monthly report page, you can view the total work activity summary for this month\n2. Scroll down and fill in the required field, then click the [Finish] button at the top right to save it

string-array.name: crm_ledger
string-array.item: Click the [+] button at the bottom of the main page calendar
Click the [Statistic report] button in the menu
Click on the select item in the statistical report (e.g. Achievement rate of personal goal)

1. Through Achievement rate of personal goal, you can check whether your target and amount achieve this month expectations, and compare to the sales data of the previous period for analysis.\n2.Each statistical report can use filters to display differnet view
Use the filter criteria to narrow or enlarge the range of the displayed data. After setting, click [Finish] to return to the statistics chart to view the filter results.

string-array.name: crm_client
string-array.item: Click the [+] button at the bottom of the main page calendar
Click the [Customer] button in the menu

1. Through the filter criteria: key customers, regional sorting, stroke sorting can initially select customers\n2. Click on any customer to view specific information\n3. Browse more information by up and down gesture scrolling

1. Enter the specific customer page, click the left selection button [group member records], you can browse releated business and activity records\n2. Browse more records by up and down gesture scrolling

1. Click on the right side of the customer page [More >] to view the basic information of choosing customer\n2. Enter the specific customer page, click the right selection button [work item], you can see how many projects are in progress
Customer master data page can view the basic information and related contact persons

string-array.name: crm_client_add_project
string-array.item: Enter the specific customer page, click the [+] arrow in [work item] to create a new project
Step by step to fill in fields of the new project
If form is completed, then click the [Finish] button in the upper right corner to save it
After saving,new project can be viewed in the [work item] list

string-array.name: crm_client_add_salesstage
string-array.item: Enter the specific customer page, click on the [percentage of sales stage] in selected project
Enter [percentage of sales stage], click on the top [+ new sales opportunities] button

Enter the sales stage page, display the six sales stages, click the radio button of choosing stage to estimate win rate, by the way click the right down arrow could expand sub-progress under the stage
1. If choosing“Lost case”, you have to choose reason of lost \n2. After completing the filling, click the [Finish] button on the upper right to save it
After [percentage of sales stage] completion ,then click the [history] you can view events list during the current sales stage

string-array.name: crm_client_check_project
string-array.item: Enter the specific customer page, click on the [work item] to preview work items
1. Enter the work item page, scrolls it to view more information of the work item

string-array.name: crm_client_add_history
string-array.item: Enter the specific customer page, click on the [history] in selected project
Enter [percentage of sales stage], click on the top [+ new history] button
Before new history editing completely, you have to apply a new task (e.g. visit activity)
Step by step to fill in fields of the new application, click the [Finish] button on the upper right to save it
After [percentage of sales stage] completion ,then click the [history] you can view tasks list during the current sales stage

string-array.name: crm_client_check_history
string-array.item: Enter the specific customer page, click on the [history] in selected project
Click the [history] button which choosed project under the [work item], history task list (from recent to the earliest) display by sorted. Click specific task to view the detail
Enter the history page (e.g. Quotation task) , scrolls it to view more information of the quotation task

string-array.name: crm_approval_list
string-array.item: Click the [+] button at the bottom of the main page calendar
Click the [Application list] button in the menu
Click on the select item in the Application list (e.g. Quotation task)
Enter Approval Details page,please click [submmit] button on the top of screen if your request aren\'t submmit,then this approval would send to approvor
1.Can select single submit or multi submit\n\n2.Click [Submit and send] below to finish submit job
There are three pages include unproved、passed、Deny that mean show state of approval
Click on of the list,scrolls it to view more information

string-array.name: crm_execution
string-array.item: Click the [+] button at the bottom of the main page calendar
Click the [Approved to execute] button in the menu
Enter Approval page,Click [Approval button]to excute Approval
Select single Approval or multi approval in Approval page
Select [Agree] or [Deny] button in approval processing
Approver also can Fill opinion in approval processing，click [confirm] to finish approval

string-array.name: crm_reimburse
string-array.item: Click the [+] button at the bottom of the main page calendar
Click the [Reimbursement record] button in the menu
Select and review Reimbursement record in list
Enter the Reimbursement page (e.g. Quotation task) , scrolls it to view more information

string-array.name: crm_salesforce
string-array.item: Click the [+] button at the bottom of the main page calendar
Click the [Sales opportunities] button in the menu
This page would show six stages,click arrow on the right side for each stage, would display detail infomation
1.for example as Stage 4,It\'s display all work items belong to stage 4\n\n2.click one of work item to review detail infomation
Enter the detail page of work item ,scroll up or down on the screen to dispaly more information

string-array.name: crm_profile
string-array.item: Click the [+] button at the bottom of the main page calendar
Click the [Personal] button in the menu
1.To edit or review personal data\n\n2.click [EDIT] to modify personal data
Click [Finish] to save it when edit form have done

string-array.name: crm_setting_change_password
string-array.item: Click the [+] button at the bottom of the main page calendar
Click the [Setup] button in the menu
Click [User Password]
Enter page of revise user password，input old password and tiwce new password，click [finish] when edit form have done

string-array.name: crm_setting_gesture_lock
string-array.item: Click the [+] button at the bottom of the main page calendar
Click the [Setup] button in the menu
Click [graphic gesture settings]
Useing finger to Draw four point or more on the screen
Confirm your graphic gesture again to finish setting
1.The screen dispaly status of graphic gesture settings in on\n\n2.switching to OFF would be disable graphic gesture
